rule: The chatbot must return only a single part-of-speech tag that corresponds to the specified word within the provided sentence.
input: Bright sun shines in the sky, sun
complianceText:
The chatbot output "WRB: Wh-word" does not comply with the description provided. The description specifies that the chatbot should only return the part of speech tag, without any additional explanation or description of the tag. Therefore, the correct output should only be "WRB" without ": Wh-word". Adding descriptive text violates the instruction to return just the tag.

ERR
